attributes.action: TO CHANGE A LIFE SENTENCE WITH NO TARIFF
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
stockford781@btinternet.com             12th jan 2010
Raped BY KILLER FREED ON PAROLE .You may have seen or heard about the recent COPYCAT RAPIST TRIAL in November 2009, I am HELEN STOCKFORD the victim,i can`t believe this man has been given 28 days to appeal against his LIFE sentence with a 9 yr tariff killer mark shirley re-enacted elements of his 1987 murder to a 66yr old we feel he should get life with no parole.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the courts.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
